DBD is a poorly balanced and deathly frustrating video game that, even with new additions and reworks to previous mechanics, killer powers, and perks always being implemented, still somehow manages to retain a consistent level of un-fun frustration in design and balancing. Every patch will come out with changes that completely rework what is considered the 'meta'. Killer powers are always being investigated for potential improvements in gameplay and/or balance, but these changes happen very slowly; one killer's powers about every few months. With each patch, midchapter, and chapter, problems come out; reasonable and expected sure, but when the problems persist until the next patch and new bugs and problems surface and resurface, and reworked killers are still not fun to play as or against, the game is stuck in a perpetual state of disarray and inconsistency with balancing.

All that can be taken from playing the game is frustration and disappointment at the lack of awareness on behalf of the developers when it comes to making certain perks, items, offerings, addons or powers have realistic counterplay. The game has been out since 2016 and only in 2021 did they rework the most blatantly un-fun and overpowered mechanics that were in the game; some killer ultra-rare addons that lacked balance for survivors and memento mori, an offering that can be played by the killer of a match to kill one survivor after they had been hooked once, now changed to only work after a survivor has been hooked twice. These positive changes are great when they come out but the changes take literal years to be implemented and to this day of editing this review (May 2022) there still exists other examples of this kind of issue.
I have been so very patient with waiting for the game to slowly but surely round its sharp edges when it comes to moving to a more balanced game, and many positive changes have been made recently (moris have been reworked, perks re-thought out, and more) but still the only joy I can find in the game is the rare public match where each side plays appropriately and does not abuse flaws in the game design or when playing with friends, though each of us come with requirements for what killers or perksets can be used when playing against each other in a custom match because some killers or perksets are blatantly un-fun to play against. There are many examples of these killers or perksets that are just *Broken*. 

Let's talk about killers. Some are downright impossible to beat at a high skill level: right now that is The Nurse and The Artist, some have addons that completely undermine the basic balancing of the game, and others are simply boring to play against. The last issue is vague so I'll dive into it, here is an example: The Twins incentivizes leaving your primary killer, Charlotte, in areas to prevent survivors from completing objectives or helping teammates (rescuing them from hook, picking up downed survivors, etc.) whilst you control your brother, Victor, to down survivors, trap them in lockers, or injure healthy survivors and prevent them from performing any actions for a certain amount of time. Killers worth their salt will utilize this inherent tactic of choosing where to leave Charlotte and play Victor to apply pressure to survivors as Victor while maintaining a presence anywhere else in the map, despite the changes that were made to The Twins recently that incentivized keeping distance from hooks as Charlotte. This killer was downright awful on launch (or at least in the PTB; Public test build) but was reworked in a positive way, reducing the incentive to play this way, yet the tactic still remains essential to how the killer is played. Why is this boring? Well, this killer's ability incentivizes the player to 'slug' which renders a player or players still in the match unable to do anything at all, camping hook which accomplishes the same thing, camping important objectives like powerful hex totems or center of gens, blocking powerful loops or placing Charlotte in places that would otherwise put more pressure on chase that cannot be counterplayed. The Twins is just one example, and I think it's important to clarify that I divvy my time in DBD between playing both killer and survivor, but will only play about ten different killers regularly because the rest are not fun for everyone else in the match. 

The game has only become more of a joke since last year and playing the game in a public match, even with friends, is just a bad experience. Ask anyone who plays DBD as a content creator and they will tell you that in order to play DBD you need a LOT of patience with errors in game design, and a LOT of composure when playing against unfair circumstances. The Game Director, Matheiu Cote, responded to this complaint in a Q&A about how frustrating, stressful, unfun, and unfair matches are (due to poor insight into the balancing the game) some time ago by stating that they should "try playing another game for a week, try civilization," despite stating that the point was a valid one just before responding to the question. 

Every time my friends and I play this game now we all leave our discord call either salty, bored, or surprised by how not-frustrated we are after the matches we've had because we've come to expect a bad experience when playing. And that rarely happens with any other game; it's a game that scratches an itch no other can scratch so from time to time you get the urge to play still knowing you probably won't enjoy the time you spend on it. 

Dead By Daylight's progression system is addicting (it will be changing soon, though, hopefully for the better), its basic game concept is great (though my friends often find the basic premise boring, that is: chasing someone around object over and over, or being chased around loops over and over), the style of the game is impeccable in my opinion, and the customization is great. 

A few of these pros however, seem to be heading out the door. The style of the game: new cosmetics will be added to DBD that would ruin the theme/style of the game: the Attack on Titan cosmetics. I can only hope for the sake of the game in the future that they decide to keep any AoT cosmetics to mobile version as it would ruin the style of the game their art team has worked so hard to keep relative to the game's theme and style but also carefree and fun. To rephrase, the AoT cosmetics ought to be kept out of base game in order to keep alive, in my opinion, the beautiful artistic horror style (with some holiday fun!) DBD has managed to create through meshing and weaving different horror movies, shows, and original characters with fitting cosmetics into one video game.

To conclude this long-winded review, if you, the Reader, can stomach a frustrating, unfun, unbalanced, and from time-to-time unplayable game, then why would you even bother reading the reviews in the first place? Don't sink the time or money into DBD as it is, in my opinion, not a good place to put those valuable resources.

This is the game that made me appreciate horror games. It is SO much fun to play with or without friends, but I recommend grabbing three friends to party up with if you can cause it's just a blast. I love all the different pop icons this game includes as well as some really cool and unique original killers too. Seriously, if you're on the fence, just get it. Its gonna be well worth it!

Игра весьма сильно затягивает,если вы играете в компании друзей,но так же присутствуют некоторые минусы:
1)Дизбаланс между сурвами и маньяком,т.к. хорошее пати при должной комуникации не оставляет убийце ни шанса.
1.2)Из предыдущего вытекает огромная проблема рейтинга,т.к. если вы закончите игру за минут 5-6 ни дав никого повесить,то вы не наберете должное количество очков для получения ранга,и что хуже,-можете и вовсе уйти в минус.
2)Слабый пул карт.Да,для недолгой игры вам их хватит,но на большем промежутке времени они вам наскучат,т.к. на всех картах конструкции повторяются(тежка,тройка,шестерка,лачуга и тд).
3)К последнему минусу,который сразу бросается в глаза,хотелось бы отнести регистрацию хитов.Все-таки иногда не хватает хорошо оптимизированных серверов.
4)За игроков и баланс говорить не вижу смысла,т.к. с подобными вещами разработчики борятся во всех играх,а неадекватные игроки - это не проблема игры.
__________________________________________________________
Плюсы: 
1)Отличное разнообразие персонажей,и соответственно,стилей игры.Каждый может собрать свой билд из 4 перков и играть,отталкиваясь от своих возможностей.
2)Активное комьюнити,т.к. по сути игра не имеет какой-либо сверх-оригинальной идеи,но при этом имеет стабильный онлайн и фан-базу с активными пользователями.
3)Давольно частые обновление,которые завозят в игру нового сурва и маньяка,которые добавляют в игру новые краски и возможности.
__________________________________________________________
Вывод:
Если вы думаете о покупке этой игры и хотели почитав мнения других пользователей найти ответ,то вот:
Стоит ли игра 500 руб - ДА
Весело ли играть в соло - Скорее нет,чем да,но все по вкусу
Весело ли играть в пати - Однозначно ДА
Ну и хотелось бы добавить,что игра часто продается по скидке,также проводятся бесплатные выходные,которые дадут вам возможность точно узнать,стоит ли игра вашего времени.

Very immersive, and gives a pretty real sense of panic and terror. Playing Killer is a much more varied experience, with dozens of different unique abilities to use, but playing Survivor is where the real scares are. Not a game to play if you want to de-stress, as gameplay is often hectic and tense. On top of that, it's not the most polished, and features many mechanics easily abused by toxic players. But overall, feeling like you're in a slasher movie is pretty fun.

СУКА НАДЕЮСЬ ЭТА ИГРА ПРОВАЛИТСЯ И У НЕЕ ОНЛАЙ БУДЕТ ОТ СИЛЫ 200 ЧЕЛОВЕК В СРЕДНЕМ ЗА МЕСЯЦ ЕБАНАЯ ИГРА ОТ ТУПЫХ РАЗРАБОВ КОТОРЫЕ НИХУЯ НИЧЕГО НЕ УМЕЮТ УДАЧИ НЕ ПОКУПАЙТЕ ЭТУ ХУЙНЮ ЕБАНУЮ ПРОСТО ПОЛНЫЙ ШЛАК. ИГРА НЕ РАБОТАЕТ ПО СВОИМ ДАЖЕ БЛЯДСКИМ ПРАВИЛАМ, МОДЕЛЬКИ 1000 ЛЕТ НАХУЙ НЕ ОБНОВЛЯЮТ, ЕБАНЫЕ ИВЕНТЫ КОТОРЫЕ НАХУЯ НИКОМУ НЕ НУЖНЫ, ПРОСТО ДАЙТЕ НОРМАЛЬНУЮ ИГРУ БЕЗ БАГОВ ЛАГОВ И ХУЙНИ. С НОРМАЛЬНЫМИ ХИТБОКСАМИ СУКААААААА
